thread.title: Ciara on ‘The Color Purple’: “One of My Proudest Accomplishments of My Career”
thread.title_full: Ciara on ‘The Color Purple’: “One of My Proudest Accomplishments of My Career”

author: Sam
title: Ciara on ‘The Color Purple’: “One of My Proudest Accomplishments of My Career”
text: With [‘The Color Purple’](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/10/extended-trailer-the-color-purple-starring-fantasia-halle-bailey-ciara-danielle-brooks-taraji-p-henson-more/) off to a [blazing start at the US box office](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/12/the-color-purple-triumphs-with-huge-christmas-day-opening/), Ciara has joined her castmates in celebrating the film everyone is talking about. As reported, the singer – who [gave birth to her fourth child earlier this month](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2023/12/ciara-gives-birth-welcomes-new-baby-girl-with-russell-wilson/) – plays adult Nettie in the Blitz Bazawule-directed film. Reimagined as a musical, the latest incarnation of Alice Walker‘s beloved tale also sees CiCi appear on its [star-studded soundtrack.](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2023/12/stream-the-color-purple-soundtrack-featuring-fantasia-usher-megan-thee-stallion-mary-j-blige-h-e-r-alicia-keys-more/) In a touching post, the [‘Level Up’](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2018/07/new-song-ciara-level-full/) performer reflects on what the moment means to her and her trajectory at large. See what she had to say below… Sharing a clip of her dancing and posing it up with the likes of castmates Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P. Henson, and Danielle Brooks, as well as the film’s producer Oprah Winfrey, Ciara wrote: “One of my proudest accomplishments of my career and this year! This was truly an honor to be a part of this beautiful ensemble. Thank you @BlitzAmbassador for believing in me. Me as Nettie! @TheColorPurple Out Now 💜” One of my proudest accomplishments of my career and this year! This was truly an honor to be a part of this beautiful ensemble. Thank you [@BlitzAmbassador]for believing in me. Me as Nettie! [@TheColorPurple]Out Now 💜 [pic.twitter.com/xWDazHw2mc] — Ciara (@ciara) [December 28, 2023] Touching! ‘The Color Purple,’ which has [nabbed multiple Golden Globes nominations](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/12/golden-globes-2024-full-nominations-list-fantasia-danielle-brooks-colman-domingo-barbie-more-named/), is playing in US theaters now and dances into UK cinemas on January 26.
